item.title: Data Talks Club: Machine Learning in Marketing
item.description:
On Friday 13th of May 2022 I was invited to join Alexey Grigorev in an event organised by DataTalks.Club to talk about Machine Learning in Marketing. It was a really insightful discussion and i would like to thanks the organizers who make it possible. Here is the recording:

Here are some useful links and resources about the subject:

  • Relevant blog post I have written about the subject:

    • Media Effect Estimation with Orbitâ€™s KTR Model
    • Media Effect Estimation with PyMC: Adstock, Saturation & Diminishing Returns
    • PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022: Introduction to Uplift Modeling
    • BG/NBD Model in PyMC
    • Gamma-Gamma Model of Monetary Value in PyMC

  • Books and references to learn more about marketing data science
